content: 🎄 #Coding #Xmas spirit in the house! 🎄☃️Our #CoderDojo Christmas Special was so much fun! 🎅 Children from BindTuning and DevScope explored the logic behind coding through games, played together, and made new friends. 👾 The DevScope team prepared super cool t-shirts and snacks.Thank you all for attending!! This was a special afternoon. 💚 #STEM #STEMeducation #CodingForKids #CodingForChildren #CodingCommunity #GivingBack #MerryChristmas …more
